Text.Language: Twbh m~P[oic e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pinis] n~ar,ie~reuc: abba Petroc ieromarturoc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf / O great archpriest / Abba Peter the holy martyr / that He may forgive us our sins.
